projectDescription: Funding for maintaining school in low income area. electric, water, gas improvments.

milestones.title: Project Kickoff and Planning
milestones.description: Finalizing project scope and objectives., Identifying key stakeholders and forming a project team., Developing a detailed project plan., Establishing communication and reporting protocols.
milestones.paymentDetails: : 10% of total project budget, due at the end of Month 1.

milestones.title: Needs Assessment and Survey
milestones.description: Conducting a comprehensive survey of the existing infrastructure., Identifying areas in need of improvement., Prioritizing improvements based on need and impact.
milestones.paymentDetails: : 15% of total project budget, due at the end of Month 3.

milestones.title: Procurement and Contracting
milestones.description: Developing detailed specifications for the improvements., Soliciting bids from contractors., Awarding contracts.
milestones.paymentDetails: : 15% of total project budget, due at the end of Month 5.

milestones.title: Execution and Monitoring
milestones.description: Overseeing the execution of the improvement works., Monitoring the progress and quality of the work., Ensuring compliance with all relevant regulations and standards.
milestones.paymentDetails: : 30% of total project budget, due in two installments at the end of Month 7 and Month 9.

milestones.title: Testing and Commissioning
milestones.description: Testing the new infrastructure to ensure it meets the specifications., Commissioning the new infrastructure., Training school staff on the use and maintenance of the new infrastructure.
milestones.paymentDetails: : 15% of total project budget, due at the end of Month 10.

milestones.title: Project Closure and Handover
milestones.description: Documenting the project outcomes and lessons learned., Conducting a final project review and evaluation., Handing over the project to the school administration.
milestones.paymentDetails: : 15% of total project budget, due at the end of Month 12.
